channel.title: Add new words in OpenEars Dictionary – Politepix

item.title: Add new words in OpenEars Dictionary
item.dc:creator: jainanoop
item.description:
Hey,
I am using OpenEars framework for speech recognition, It works for words that have already added in OpenEars1.languagemodel file, and here OpenEars1.dic file is also used. My problem is that i want to add few words in that files therefore i can recognise newly add words.
I searched but don’t know where and how to add more words ?
Thanks in advance.

Anoop

item.title: Reply To: Add new words in OpenEars Dictionary
item.dc:creator: Halle Winkler
item.description:
Welcome Anoop,

Please use the tutorial for an introduction to creating your own vocabularies with OpenEars: /openears/tutorial

item.title: Reply To: Add new words in OpenEars Dictionary
item.dc:creator: jainanoop
item.description:
Hi Halle,
Thanks for update, i read the document but still didn’t get the exact way how to create own vocabularies.

Anoop

item.title: Reply To: Add new words in OpenEars Dictionary
item.dc:creator: Halle Winkler
item.description: OK, if the explanations in the tutorial, and the OpenEars documentation, and the sample app comments aren’t clear, I regretfully can’t help further. I would be rewriting the explanations and sample code from those sources, just in a different place.
